<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/tenants/{tenant_id}/campaigns/list"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetch all campaigns for the tenant with pagination, filters, and search

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"search","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Search term for campaign name or description","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"status","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Filter by campaign status","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"page","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Page number","schema":{"default":1,"type":"number"}},{"name":"limit","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Number of items per page","schema":{"default":10,"type":"number"}},{"name":"tenant_id","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
